sentences.sContent: Oil thieves sometimes hawk stolen gasoline on the side of highways.
sentences.sContent_eng: Oil thieves sometimes hawk stolen gasoline on the side of highways.
sentences.sCn: 石油大盗们有时在公路边上兜售偷来的石油。

synos.tran: 兜售，沿街叫卖；捕捉；咳出
清嗓；咳嗽；像鹰一般地袭击
[鸟]鹰；鹰派成员；掠夺他人的人

phrases.pCn: 黑鹰直升机（80年代美军主力通用直升机）
小鹰号航空母舰 （战斗群） （美）；基蒂霍克（美国北卡罗莱纳州一小村庄）

remMethod.val: 美国的两个党派： 鹰派(Hawk)和鸽派(Dove)

words.tran: 袭击；翱翔；攫取（hawk的现在分词）

trans.tranOther: a large bird that hunts and eats small birds and animals
to try to sell goods, usually by going from place to place and trying to persuade people to buy them
